Text: Do you really have this? Cause O baby do I want a copy!!! I have all of his other works but Failed to get this one when it was out.. sadly was cought up in legal economics and was unable to purchase this puppy. Please, please, please... Let me get a copy of this. BTW.. for all of you that have never read or heard any on S.K.'s works,.. Go here : http://www.darkatlas.com/ and become engourged in what is probably one of the best writers of the new century.
